RolesÂ¶

givemeÂ¶

Give you one or more giveable roles, separated by commas.

`{prefix}giveme Java` - gives you the role called Java, if it exists

{prefix}giveme Java, Python - gives you the roles called Java and Python, if they exist list ++++ Lists all giveable roles for this server.

`{prefix}giveme list` - lists all giveable roles

addÂ¶

Makes an existing role giveable, or creates one if it doesnâ€™t exist. Name must not contain commas. Similar to create, but will use an existing role if one exists.

`{prefix}giveme add Java` - creates or finds a role named "Java" and makes it giveable

{prefix}giveme Java - gives you the Java role that was just found or created delete ++++++ Deletes and removes a giveable role.

`{prefix}giveme removefromlist Java` - removes the role "Java" from the list of giveable roles but does not remove it from the server or members who have it

removefromlistÂ¶

Deletes and removes a giveable role.

purgeÂ¶

Force a purge of giveme roles that no longer exist in the guild

removeÂ¶

Removes multiple giveable roles from you. Names must be separated by commas.

`{prefix}giveme remove Java` - removes the role called "Java" from you (if it can be given with `{prefix}giveme`)

{prefix}giveme remove Java, Python - removes the roles called â€œJavaâ€ and â€œPythonâ€ from you create ++++++ Create a giveable role. Name must not contain commas. Similar to add, but will always create a new role.

`{prefix}giveme create Python` - creates a role named "Python" and makes it giveable

{prefix}giveme Python - gives you the Python role that was just created tempgive ++++++++ Temporarily gives a member a role for a set time. Not restricted to giveable roles.

`{prefix}tempgive cooldude#1234 1h Java` - gives cooldude any role, giveable or not, named Java for one hour

giveÂ¶

Gives a member a role. Not restricted to giveable roles.

`{prefix}give cooldude#1234 Java` - gives cooldude any role, giveable or not, named Java

takeÂ¶

Takes a role from a member. Not restricted to giveable roles.

`{prefix}take cooldude#1234 Java` - takes any role named Java, giveable or not, from cooldude

rolemenuÂ¶

Base command for setting up and tracking reaction roles

`{prefix}rolemenu createmenu #roles Example role menu`: Creates an empty role menu embed

{prefix}rolemenu addrole <message id> @robots ğŸ¤–: adds the reaction role â€˜robotsâ€™ to the target message {prefix}rolemenu delrole <message id> @robots: removes the reaction role â€˜robotsâ€™ from the target message createmenu ++++++++++ Creates a blank reaction role menu

`{prefix}rolemenu createmenu #roles Example role menu`: Creates an empty role menu embed

delroleÂ¶

Removes a reaction role from a message or a role menu

-----To target a role menu use this format-----

{prefix}rolemenu delrole <message id> <@robots or â€œRobotsâ€> â€”â€“To target a custom message use this formatâ€”â€“ {prefix}rolemenu delrole <channel> <message id> <@robots or â€œRobotsâ€> addrole +++++++ Adds a reaction role to a message or a role menu

  -----To target a role menu use this format-----
`{prefix}rolemenu addrole <message id> <@robots or "Robots"> ğŸ¤–`
â€”â€“To target a custom message use this formatâ€”â€“

{prefix}rolemenu addrole <channel> <message id> <@robots or â€œRobotsâ€> ğŸ¤–
